name: Defend Tower Notebook Castle
description:
Download now to DEFEND your NOTEBOOK WORLD over progressive levels of difficulty.

To win you will need to employ your weapons intelligently against the correct targets, being mindful of each weapons advantages and reload times. i.e. arrows are less effective against hard targets and heavy weapons can be wasteful against soldiers.

Features
- Easy to use intuitive controls
- Beautiful hand drawn unique graphics
- Cool battle sound effects
- Different unique Super Weapon’s for you to use
- Increasing AI toughness with each level (look out!)

Any suggestions, feedback or comments welcome:
support@nuclearapps.com

* Check out our other apps at nuclearapps.com *
